attributes.action: Please bring back funding for south Norfolk fertility treatment
attributes.background: For couples in south Norfolk struggling to start a family to have an opportunity to do so with support of the NHS. There is No reason for us to suffer only because of where we live! Please help south Norfolk get the funding people need to begin making their dreams come true.

rejection.details:
This decision was taken by South Norfolk Clinical Commissioning Group, not the Government or Parliament. 

You can find out more here:

http://www.southnorfolkccg.nhs.uk/news/level-3-fertility-services
